title: Dorit Kemsley (of RHOBH) Pays Lots of Lip Service, But Little Taxes
description:
Despite the fact that Dorit Kemsley may be one of the best and most luxurious dressers on Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, it seems that she’s paying a bit too much on her fashions and not enough on her taxes.  Tune in as we break down her (and PK’s) ongoing issues with the IRS. 

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/legallyjudgy
LinkTree: https://linktr.ee/legallyjudgy
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
